strapiPost.title: Pack Rat Outdoor Center Celebrating Fifty Years Of Adventure
strapiPost.content:
Founded by Scott and Carolyn Crook in 1973, Pack Rat Outdoor Center will host its 50th Anniversary Celebration the week of Jul 23-29, including daily drawings for gift cards and a huge party on the 29th with food, music, and games!

  • Packed & ready: Pack Rat features a huge selection of gear and clothing for hiking, floating, climbing, and camping and provides services like pack fitting, gear repair, and roof rack, kayak & bike carrier installation.
  • Unpacked: Not just a gear store, the Outdoor Center is deeply embedded in the community and regularly hosts a variety of skills clinics and fundraising events, like Pint Nights each spring and fall, to support local nonprofits.

To celebrate 50 years of Pack Rat, we're giving away a sit-on-top Tidal Kayak to one of our NWA Daily Fans! If you're part of our Fan Program, reply to this email for a chance to win!
